verses.name: Acts 7:57
verses.text: Then they cried out with a loud voice, and stopped their ears, and ran upon him with one accord,

verses.name: Acts 7:58
verses.text: And cast him out of the city, and stoned him: and the witnesses laid down their clothes at a young man’s feet, whose name was Saul.

verses.name: Acts 7:59
verses.text: And they stoned Stephen, calling upon God, and saying, Lord Jesus, receive my spirit.

verses.name: Acts 7:60
verses.text: And he kneeled down, and cried with a loud voice, Lord, lay not this sin to their charge. And when he had said this, he fell asleep.
